name: Episodic Horror - Episode 1
description: game will have multiple episodes, Episodic Horror - Episode 1, in this episode you are a 19 year old male named "Mark" and you work at a tiny store, you notice some weird things happening at the store, such as moving humanoid figures weird noises and etc, but you get to leave work, unexpectedly, to go home and take a nap, to get woken by a sound, play to find out what it is...
